column2: "Nna Efraimnyi banyin bi wɔ hɔ a ofi Ramataim-zofim
column3: wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu a ne dzin dze Elkana. Ɔyɛ Zuf ne ba
column4: Tohu ne ba Elihu ne ba Jeroham ne ba."

column2: "Nna ɔwɔ yernom beenu; ɔbaako ne dzin dze Hanna
column3: na ɔbaako so dze Peninna: na Peninna wɔ mba
column4: na Hanna dze nna onnyi bi."

column2: "Nna afrenhyia biara ɔbarimba yi fi no kurow mu kɔ dɛ ɔrokɔsɔr na ɔabɔ afɔr ama dɔm EWURADZE wɔ Siloh. Nna hɔ na Eli ne mbabanyin beenu no
column3: Hofni na Finehas

column2: "Na sɛ da du ma Elkana kɔbɔ afɔr a
column3: ɔma ne yer Peninna
column4: na ne mbabanyin na ne mbabaa nyinara kyɛpɛn:"

column2: "na Hanna dze ɔma no kyɛpɛn mbɔho: osiandɛ ɔdɔ Hanna
column3: na mbom EWURADZE esiw n'awoo kwan:"

column2: "na no kora no yii no ehi dodoodow
column3: dɛ ɔrema n'ayawdzi ayɛ kɛse

column2: "Na afrenhyia biara sɛ wɔkɔ EWURADZE fie a
column3: nna oyi no ehi; dɛm ntsi Hanna su

column2: "Na no kun Elkana see no dɛ
column3: Hanna
column5: na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na inndzidzi
column6: na emma wo bo nndwe yi? Ana minnye mma wo nnsen mbabanyin du?"

column2: "Na dabi wodzidzii wɔ Siloh
column3: na wɔnomee wiei ekyir no Hanna soɛree. Afei nna ɔsɔfo Eli tse n'egua do wɔ EWURADZE n'asɔrdan no n'ano pondua no ho."

column2: "Na Hanna ne kra werɛ howee
column3: na oyii mpaa maa EWURADZE

column2: "Na ɔbɔɔ anohoba see dɛ
column3: Dɔm EWURADZE
column9: medze no bɛma EWURADZE no nkwa nda nyinara
column10: na oyindam bi rennka ne tsir."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ogu do ara robɔ mpaa wɔ EWURADZE enyim no
column3: Eli hyɛɛ n'ano nsew."

column2: "Afei Hanna kasae wɔ n'akoma mu; n'anofamfa nko na ohihimii
column3: na ne ndze dze wɔanntse: dɛm ntsi Eli dween dɛ ɔabow nsa."

column2: "Na Eli see no dɛ
column3: Ebɔbow nsa ara ma eekodu dabɛn? Ma wo nsa no mfi wo do."

column2: "Na Hanna buae see dɛ
column3: Oho
column5: meyɛ ɔbaa a me kra dzi yaw; wenyin na nsa dzendzen so monnoom bi
column6: mbom m'akoma mu asɛm na mehue egu EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Mma mmbu w'abaawa dɛ ɔbaa sansanyi: na me nkɔmbɔdzi na m'abohur dodow mu na makasa ebodu sisei."
"Nna Eli buae see dɛ
column3: Kɔ asomdwee mu: na Israel Nyankopɔn mma wo w'adzeserɛ a aserɛ wɔ no hɔ no."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ma w'abaawa nnya w'enyim enyimnyam. Nna ɔbaa no sii mu kɔr no kwan

column2: "Na wɔsoɛɛr anapaatu
column3: na wɔkɔsɔree wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: na wɔsanee baa hɔn fie wɔ Rama: na Elkana nye ne yer Hanna dae; na EWURADZE kaa no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a mber durii no
column3: Hanna nyinsenii
column4: na ɔwoo babanyin; na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Samuel
column7: "#1.20 SAMUEL: Asekyerɛ nye dɛ: Nyankopɔn atse."

column2: "Na ɔbarimba Elkana no
column3: na ne fie nyinara
column4: sii mu kɔr dɛ wɔrokɔbɔ afrenhyia afɔr
column5: na ɔapon n'anohoba no dze ama EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Hanna dze ɔannkɔ; na ɔsee no kun dɛ
column3: Moronnkɔ ara gyedɛ abofra no etwa enumfo ana
column4: na nkyii medze no aba EWURADZE enyim
column5: na ɔaatsena hɔ daa asom no."

column2: "Na no kun Elkana see no dɛ
column3: Yɛ dza ehwɛ a oye no ara; tsintsim dɛ ibotwa no enumfo ana; EWURADZE ara na ɔnhyɛ n'asɛm dzen. Nna ɔbaa no tsintsimii na ɔmaa ne ba no enumfo
column4: dze kodur dɛ otwaa no enumfo ana."

column2: "Na otwaa no enumfo no ɔfaa no kaa noho
column3: nye nantwinyin a oedzi mfe ebiasa
column6: na ɔdze no baa EWURADZE fie wɔ Siloh: nna abofra no suar."

column2: "Na wokum ɔnantwinyin no na wɔdze abofra no brɛɛ Eli."
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ao mo wura
column6: emi nye ɔbaa no a obegyinaa wo nkyɛn ha bɔɔ mpaa maa EWURADZE no."

column2: "Abofra yi ntsi na mobɔɔ mpaa no; na EWURADZE dze m'adzeserɛdze a meserɛɛ no wɔ no hɔ no ama me:"
"Dɛm ntsi mo so medze no ama EWURADZE; mber tsentsen a ɔtse ase no ɔyɛ EWURADZE dze. Na ɔsɔɔr EWURADZE wɔ hɔ."
